title: Toxic News And Your Retirement
author: Seeking Alpha

description: The top three news stories spooking investors are ToXiC -- with the T for Trade, Brexit in the middle and OPEC at the end. Pundits will be telling you to sell, but investors should follow their own individual plan, not the herd. There is however one group for whom a toxic market may indeed be problematic, and that is retirees or those on the cusp of retirement.
